definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
Tudi Gong, the God of the earth
land use plan (official P.R.C. government term)
pinyin: tu3 di4 li4 yong4 gui1 hua4

sentences.english: We are busy preparing the land for sowing.
sentences.chinese: 我们忙于平整土地，准备播种。

sentences.english: Shehuo is a continuation of an ancient tradition of offering sacrifices to Land Gods and Fire Gods.
sentences.chinese: 社火是古代祭祀土地神和火神活动的延续。

sentences.english: Contract after rent in the countryside la nd circulation practice blooming.
sentences.chinese: 反租倒包在农村土地流转的实践中脱颖而出。

sentences.english: The developer is under the family, is responsible for land which digests encircles .
sentences.chinese: 开发商是“下家”，负责消化圈来的土地。

sentences.english: The land has been confiscated and all the formalities are ready for starting construction.
sentences.chinese: 该项目土地已征迁，各项手续齐备，可开工建设。

sentences.english: We will move forward with reform of the rural land management system in an orderly manner.
sentences.chinese: 有序推进农村土地管理制度改革。

sentences.english: Buzzing insects will infest all your trees and the crops of your soil.
sentences.chinese: 害虫要吃尽你所有的树木和土地的出产。

sentences.english: Who lived in the land in the time of Moses?
sentences.chinese: 那片土地在摩西时代居住的是什么人？

sentences.english: He ordered the land to be dug and trenched.
sentences.chinese: 他命令在这片土地上挖洞并挖好战壕。

sentences.english: He overlooked the land, which was still a vast expanse of whiteness.
sentences.chinese: 他忽略了土地，这仍然是一个白茫茫。

sentences.english: Sites owned by search engine optimizers are not accepted.
sentences.chinese: 通过搜索引擎优化国有土地没有被接受。

sentences.english: If farmers keep taking the land giants pandas will have nowhere to live.
sentences.chinese: 如果农民继续攫娶土地，大熊猫就没有地方可住了。

sentences.english: The future variety trend of land use is analyzed applying location quotient.
sentences.chinese: 并应用区位商数分析了未来土地利用方式的变化趋势。

sentences.english: It needs land, so absorbing Chaohu will benefit Hefei.
sentences.chinese: 因此，将巢湖的土地并入合肥对后者的发展有利。

sentences.english: The land cracked and the springs dried up and the cattle listlessly nibbled dry twings.
sentences.chinese: 土地龟裂，泉水干枯，牛儿无精打采地啃着干树枝。

sentences.english: A follower of the bandit landlord Ko Tseng-chiang, he kidnaped people for ransom, stole goods and plundered land.
sentences.chinese: 他绑架诈取赎金，偷东西，还强占别人土地。

definition: to clear a wild area for cultivation/to put under the plow
to lie idle (of arable land)/fig. rusty because of lack of practice
left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
